title: Shohei Soba
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run Japanese soba shop on the 2nd floor by Main Street Foot Bar; outside is a blackboard listing the menu items. Has soba dishes with deep fried tofu and wild edible vegetables. Each dish costs around 1000yen. Last order 6:45pm. Nearby is a shop selling steamed buns with various fillings. NOTE: please send map coordinates to happycow!
